description: The story begins with British attorney Jonathan Harder (James Castle) arriving in the far-off land of Truvadia. He finds himself at Castle Bare, the home of Count Barebackula (Damon Heart), who greets and shows him his ancestral house. Barebackula is an eclectic fellow, and he keeps a harem of quiet and dark-eyed men, all of whom Jonathan finds himself enchanted by. It quickly becomes apparent to him that there’s far more going on than everything seems, as he watches two of these men fucking at the command of the count. Jonathan Harder watches on as Alex Kof and Dylan James engage in limitless carnal pleasure. In the scenario Alex shows Dylan how to ride his intimidating nine-inch uncut dick. Dylan, in turn, gets Alex on his back for balls-deep penetration.
title: Barebackula’s Servants Fuck For Their Master
